title: o11y toolkit
content: The o11y toolkit is a set of utilities that help you debugging, augmenting, and manage your observability stacks.

title: oy-expose
content:
usage: oy-expose [<flags>] Flags: -h, --help Show context-sensitive help (also try --help-long and --help-man). --log.level=info Only log messages with the given severity or above. One of: [debug, info, warn, error] --log.format=logfmt Output format of log messages. One of: [logfmt, json] --version Show application version. Usage     docker  To execute oy-expose with docker, run:
docker run quay.io/o11y/oy-toolkit:oy-expose --help   nix  To execute oy-expose with nix, run:
nix run github:o11ydev/oy-toolkit#oy-expose -- --help

title: oy-runtrace
content:
usage: oy-runtrace [<flags>] Flags: -h, --help Show context-sensitive help (also try --help-long and --help-man). --log.level=info Only log messages with the given severity or above. One of: [debug, info, warn, error] --log.format=logfmt Output format of log messages. One of: [logfmt, json] --version Show application version. Usage     docker  To execute oy-runtrace with docker, run:
docker run quay.io/o11y/oy-toolkit:oy-runtrace --help   nix  To execute oy-runtrace with nix, run:
nix run github:o11ydev/oy-toolkit#oy-runtrace -- --help
